sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Department of Juvenile Justice Mortality Review Team Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Department of Juvenile Justice Mortality Review Team Act.

sections.heading: State policy. The following statements are the policy of this State:
sections.text: State policy. The following statements are the policy of this State:

sections.heading: Definitions. In this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:
sections.text: Definitions. In this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:

sections.heading: Report to Executive Inspector General
sections.text: Within 180 days after the Director submits a reply under subsection (a) of Section 25 concerning the implementation of a team's recommendation, the Director shall submit a further report to the chairperson of the team that made the recommendation and to the Exe

sections.heading: Indemnification of team members
sections.text: The State shall indemnify and hold harmless members of a mortality review team for all their acts, omissions, decisions, or other conduct arising out of the scope of their service on the team, except for acts, omissions, decisions, or other conduct involving willful

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
